organic.auxiliary.post_organic module#

A module for post-processing of reconstructed images generated by ORGANIC.

class organic.auxiliary.post_organic.Cube(dir, file='cube.fits', npca=3, nkmeans=3, nbest=6, show_plots=True)#

Bases: object

A class to represent a cube of images output by ORGANIC.

Parameters:

  • dir (str) – Directory containing the cube file.

  • file (str, optional) – Cube file name (default is “cube.fits”).

  • npca (int, optional) – Number of PCA components (default is 3).

  • nkmeans (int, optional) – Number of K-means clusters (default is 3).

  • nbest (int, optional) – Number of best images to single out (default is 6).

  • show_plots (bool, optional) – Whether to show plots (default is True).

dir#

Directory containing the cube file.

Type:

str

file#

Cube file name.

Type:

str

nkmeans#

Number of K-means clusters.

Type:

int

npca#

Number of PCA components.

Type:

int

nbest#

Number of best images to single out.

Type:

int

show_plots#

Whether to show plots.

Type:

bool

cube#

Cube of images.

Type:

ndarray

hdr#

FITS header.

Type:

Header

ps#

Pixel scale.

Type:

float

n#

Number of pixels.

Type:

int

x2, y2

Position of the secondary.

Type:

float

fs, f2

Flux ratios.

Type:

float

ud#

Uniform diameter of the primary.

Type:

float

denv, dsec

Spectral indices.

Type:

float

mu#

Regularization term weight.

Type:

float

fdata, ftot, frgl

Metrics data.

Type:

ndarray

pca#

PCA-projected images.

Type:

ndarray

kmeans#

K-means cluster labels.

Type:

ndarray

centers#

K-means cluster centers.

Type:

ndarray

bestimages#

Best images.

Type:

ndarray

bestmetrics#

Metrics of the best images.

Type:

ndarray

kmeanfdata, keamnfrgl, kmeanftot

Median loss terms per cluster group.

Type:

list

medians, stds

Median and standard deviation images per cluster group.

Type:

list

counts#

Number of images in each cluster group.

Type:

list

groups#

Cube of images per cluster group.

Type:

list

d#

Distance spanned by image on each side of axes.

Type:

float

x, y, r, angle

Coordinates and angles.

Type:

ndarray

radii#

Radii for radial profiles.

Type:

ndarray

profile, noises, rms

Radial profile data.

Type:

ndarray

static add_gaussian(image, x, y, f)#

Adds a Gaussian to an image.

Parameters:

  • image (ndarray) – The image to which the Gaussian will be added.

  • x (float) – Coordinates of the Gaussian center.

  • y (float) – Coordinates of the Gaussian center.

  • f (float) – Flux of the Gaussian.

Returns:

The image with the added Gaussian.

Return type:

ndarray

add_stars()#

Adds stars in the form of Gaussians to the median images.

compute_radial_profile(R, image, noise)#

Computes the radial profile.

Parameters:

  • R (int) – Number of radial bins.

  • image (ndarray) – Image data.

  • noise (ndarray) – Noise data.

do_kmeans()#

Performs K-means clustering on the PCA-projected images.

do_pca()#

Performs PCA decomposition on the cube of images.

get_chi2(dir, file)#

Calculates the chi-squared value.

Parameters:

  • dir (str) – Directory containing the data file.

  • file (str) – Data file name.

get_radial_profiles(R=20, set=-1)#

Computes and plots radial profiles of the intensity.

Parameters:

  • R (int, optional) – Number of radial bins (default is 20).

  • set (int, optional) – Index of the set to use (default is -1, which uses the entire cube).

give_best()#

Singles out the best images and plots them.

give_vis(u, v, wave, FTre, FTim)#

Calculates the visibility.

Parameters:

  • u (ndarray) – U and V coordinates.

  • v (ndarray) – U and V coordinates.

  • wave (ndarray) – Wavelengths.

  • FTre (callable) – Real and imaginary parts of the Fourier transform.

  • FTim (callable) – Real and imaginary parts of the Fourier transform.

Returns:

Absolute value and phase of the visibility.

Return type:

tuple

group_images()#

Groups images per K-means cluster.

plot_best()#

Plots the best images.

plot_kmeans()#

Plots the clustering results.

plot_median_images()#

Plots the median images per clustering group.

plot_pca()#

Plots the PCA results.

plot_radial_profile()#

Plots the radial profile.

plot_set(set)#

Plots a set of images.

Parameters:

set (int) – Index of the set to plot.

read()#

Reads the cube file and sets up coordinates.

set_coord()#

Sets up image pixel coordinates and values.

set_kmeans_metrics()#

Adds the K-means metrics to the attributes.

write_best()#

Writes the best images to separate FITS files.

write_median_images(add_stars=False)#

Writes median images per K-means cluster to FITS files.

Parameters:

add_stars (bool, optional) – Whether to add stars to the images (default is False).

organic.auxiliary.post_organic.main(sys_argv)#

Main function to execute the script.

Parameters:

sys_argv (list) – List of command-line arguments.

previous

organic.auxiliary.SelectData module

next

organic.organic module
